title: My computer keeps freezing
body: My computer keeps freezing when I'm in full screen and although tab. Why?

replies.body: It sounds like you meant your pc freezes anytime you try to alt+tab out of fullscreen? Try running league in windowed or borderless as alt+tabbing might be eating up too much processing power trying to minimize and reactivate the rest of your background programs. If that doesn't help, make sure you run through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to see if missing drivers might be the main cause.

Regardless of the type of laptop you're running, you can still have fps problems due to drivers or just improperly configured devices/settings. Run through that guide step by step, and let me know if that helps or not.
